hotel.name: Hanoi Posh Hotel
hotel.description: A hotel of top notch quality in Ha Noi. You will feel right at home when staying with us. Opening all day long!!!
hotel.address: 4A Hàng Giấy st, Hoan Kiem dist, Hanoi

room_type.info: There are single beds with a window
room_type.desc: The room is 22m2 and available on 5th and 6th floors. It is for 3 persons.

room_type.info: There are one double bed and one single bed
room_type.desc: The room is 38 m2 wide and available on the 6th, 7th and 8th floors. It is for 4 persons(parents with 2 children).

hotel.name: Khách Sạn Morning Star
hotel.description: Just the perfect place for you to stay when visiting Ha Noi. We have everything that you want and more. Always opening waiting for you.
hotel.address: Số 10 Hàng Hành, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Hanoi

hotel.name: Khách sạn Duy Tân
hotel.description: If you want to find a place to stay when visiting the beautiful city of Hue, just come to us. Our website will be up soon so keep your eyes peeled!

room_type.desc: Số lượng phòng: 6 Diện tích: 20 m2

hotel.name: Valentine Hotel Hue
hotel.description: Where love blooms. Come to our hotel and enjoy the most romantic experience you ever have when coming to Hue!

room_type.desc: Number of bed: 1 Double bed or 2 Single beds

hotel.name: Arise Hotel
hotel.description: Our lodgings offer a retrospective feel of the old Saigon as well as the dynamic feeling of one of the biggest city in Viet Nam. Come and enjoy!
hotel.address: 7/9 Nguyen Trai St., Ben Thanh Ward District 1, HCMC

room_type.info: No window, double bed, polished timber floor, ceiling fan, coffee/ tea maker and a marble bathroom with shower.
Comfortable sofa, kitchen and sleeping areas separates to makes for an elegant, lavishly appointed yet homely atmosphere.

hotel.name: Hotel Majestic
hotel.description: Simply majestic. Noone can deny our professional yet heart warming service. You will feel both like a king and a close family member when staying with us.
hotel.address: 1 Đồng Khởi, Bến Nghé, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam

room_type.info: Our Colonial rooms are elegant but also integrate innovative elements; they are very comfortable and always live up to the expectations since 1925.
Our Colonial Pool Deluxe are not olny elegant but also integrate innovative elements; they are very comfortable and always live up to the expectations since 1925.

hotel.name: Tay Do Hotel
hotel.description: Can Tho is the biggest city of South Western Viet Nam. Enjoy your stay in our hotel while exploring this wonderful city! We now offer the Deluxe Suite at half price!
hotel.address: 61 Châu Văn Liêm, An Lạc, Ninh Kiều, Cần Thơ , Việt Nam
